title: Big Data-Driven Emergency Language Proficiency Enhancement Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital device usage skills and intermediate target language comprehension
context.additional_context: Learners are general citizens who require immediate language application in daily life or professional contexts, necessitating a flexible learning environment via mobile devices.

learning_goals: Learners can achieve over 80% accuracy in daily conversations in the target language using personalized content generated via big data analysis.
Improve learning outcomes by over 30% within two weeks through a real-time feedback system based on individual learning patterns.
Utilizing dynamic content adjustment features, over 50 language expressions tailored to real-time learner needs can be applied contextually
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
